title: Frontend Projects
description: Interactive and responsive user interfaces built with modern frontend technologies.

projects.title: AI-SARVIS
projects.desc: Voice-activated AI assistant inspired by Iron Man's JARVIS — capable of performing real-time tasks like weather updates, Wikipedia searches, and AI chat.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.desc: A clean and responsive personal portfolio showcasing education, projects, and contact details with smooth animations.

learnings: Learned to structure responsive web layouts with semantic HTML5 and CSS3 Grid/Flexbox.
Understood DOM manipulation, event handling, and real-time interaction using JavaScript.
Explored Web Speech and SpeechSynthesis APIs for voice-based control and AI integration.
Integrated external APIs like OpenWeatherMap, Google Maps, and Wikipedia for live data.
Enhanced UI/UX design skills — focusing on interactivity, animations, and accessibility.

title: Backend Projects
description: Scalable and secure server-side applications with robust APIs.

projects.title: MERN Notes Backend
projects.desc: Backend server for the MERN Notes App built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides clean and scalable REST APIs for CRUD operations on notes.

projects.title: Sun Tracker (Real-Time Device Tracking)
projects.desc: A futuristic real-time location tracker using Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. Visualizes live location data on an interactive neon-themed map with real-time socket communication.

learnings: Structured RESTful API design using Express Router.
Environment configuration and modular backend architecture.
CRUD operations with MongoDB Atlas and Mongoose.
Error handling, validation, and scalability techniques.

title: ML Integrated Projects
description: AI and ML integrated full-stack solutions that blend data intelligence with real-world impact.

projects.title: Krishi Mitra (AI-Powered Farming Assistant)
projects.desc: A multilingual AI platform empowering 120+ million Indian farmers with insights on crop planning, weather alerts, irrigation, and market prices. Integrates Gemini AI, OpenWeather API, and MongoDB with a React-Flask architecture. Supports 22+ Indian languages for inclusive accessibility.

projects.title: Hope Hub (Holistic Outreach Platform)
projects.desc: A full-stack AI & ML-powered web app providing personalized guidance on health, nutrition, education, and skill development. Uses Gemini AI for natural language interactions and scikit-learn for disease prediction, NGO recommendations, and hospital finding via TF-IDF and Haversine models.

learnings: Integrated Flask with React for seamless AI-driven full-stack experiences.
Implemented real-world ML workflows: data preprocessing, model training, and deployment.
Worked with scikit-learn models (Random Forest, TF-IDF) for intelligent recommendations.
Used Gemini API for context-aware conversational intelligence and responses.
Learned scalable architecture design for production-ready AI solutions with multilingual support.
Gained experience handling large datasets and building accessible, user-centric ML apps.

title: GenAI Projects
description: Innovative AI-driven tools leveraging generative AI technologies.

projects.title: AI Research Mentor
projects.desc: A full-stack AI-powered chatbot acting as a personal mentor for students and developers exploring AI, ML, and programming. Uses RAG, Gemini API, and embeddings for contextual, step-by-step guidance.

projects.title: Codeify (AI Code Reviewer Frontend)
projects.desc: A modern React + Vite frontend integrated with GoogleGenAI for AI-driven code reviewing, improvement, and debugging. Includes Monaco Editor, Tailwind CSS, Markdown rendering, and dark mode toggle.

learnings: Engineered full-stack GenAI systems integrating RAG pipelines with Gemini API and LangChain.
Explored semantic search, context retention, and memory-driven conversational AI.
Developed modular frontend architecture using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated AI-powered code analysis with real-time syntax highlighting and markdown rendering.
Refined prompt engineering techniques for multi-turn contextual AI interactions.
